pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This time-lapse video showcases a dramatic storm brewing over a highway at sunset. Dark, turbulent clouds dominate the sky, while the horizon is set ablaze with a fiery orange and red glow, illuminating sheets of falling rain. The motion of the clouds and the light trails from passing cars are visible as time progresses.
